default_description: Ifrit is a rare hp champion from the faction Demonspawn doing void damage
lore:
Ifrits are a particular demonbreed that stands above the common foot soldiers of Sirothâ€™s hellish hierarchy. Often compared to wasps for their somewhat insectoid appearance and frequent reliance on sting-like spears, Ifrits are usually found at the head of smaller Demonspawn cohorts.

Dark magic swirls around them like an unseen mist, allowing their unholy strikes to sap away the strength of their victims or even hex those that have the skill and courage to attack them.
